Articles.Content:
So recently I was looking into modding KSP1 (making my own planets). I was wondering if there's a way I can add custom assets/models to a planet's surface in a specific area. A bit like how the monoliths and easter eggs are models placed on the ground.

Also what about placing models in orbit.  I wanted to make a cylindrical object in orbit, based of the Rama spacecraft. 

If anyone knows how to please let me know, or refer me to a youtube tutorial (as I can't find one).
